label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":15,"text":"金黄色葡萄球菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"多发型传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":26,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡葡萄糖菌病是由金黄色葡萄球菌引起的各种日龄和品种鸡的一种多发型传染病。在生产实践中，往往由于发现晚，采取措施不及时，造成很大的经济损失。

label: [{"start":10,"end":19,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病病原体","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":27,"text":"金黄色葡萄球菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (一)流行病学特征：鸡葡萄糖菌病病原体为金黄色葡萄球菌，在自然条件下广泛存在，尤其鸡的体表、羽毛等，自然带菌现象非常普遍。

label: [{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 各种日龄和品种的鸡都有易感性。所以，当笼具、网具等因素使鸡体遭受机械性损伤时，使皮肤、黏膜完整性遭受破坏时，就成为发病诱因。

label: [{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"缺乏维生素","labels":["disease"]},{"start":53,"end":59,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":63,"end":69,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 此外，饲养管理不良，环境卫生差，如饲料配比不当，缺乏维生素、矿物质，拥挤、通风不良、氨味过浓等，都可以促进鸡葡萄糖菌病的发生。鸡葡萄糖菌病还可继发于鸡痘。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"皮肤损伤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"损伤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡痘造成的皮肤损伤，常成为鸡葡萄糖菌病的感染途径，临床上见于鸡痘流行过程中或流行后期，使病情恶化，死亡率提高，损失严重。

label: [{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: (二)临床症状：各种日龄鸡患病后所表现的临床症状有时相同，有时各异。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"新生雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"脐带炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"败血症经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"迅速死亡","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 新生雏鸡常表现为脐带炎，呈败血症经过，迅速死亡。

label: [{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"败血症经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"湿润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"紫红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":69,"text":"皮下疏松","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"疏松","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":78,"text":"结缔组织中有积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":76,"end":78,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":81,"end":85,"text":"有波动感","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":86,"end":96,"text":"破溃后流出褐红色液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":91,"end":94,"text":"褐红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"食欲下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"缩颈呆立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":24,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"胸腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"头部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"四肢内侧","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"趾部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"结缔组织","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 呈败血症经过的病鸡，初期食欲下降，精神不振，缩颈呆立等一般症状，很快即可见胸腹部、头部、四肢内侧和趾部皮肤等处湿润、肿胀、紫红色、皮下疏松、结缔组织中有积液，触之有波动感。破溃后流出褐红色液体。

label: [{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"炎性坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"局部干燥结痂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"暗紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"翅尖","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"尾尖","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"冠髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"背部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"腿部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 有时在翅尖、尾尖、冠髯、背部、腿部及皮肤发生出血、糜烂或炎性坏死，局部干燥结痂，呈暗紫色。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"关节炎型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"有热有痛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"行走困难","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"跛行","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"蹲伏不动","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":59,"text":"痛苦的神态","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"肘关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"趾关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡葡萄糖菌病有时表现为关节炎型。可见跗关节、肘关节、趾关节等肿胀，有热有痛，行走困难、跛行或蹲伏不动，表现出痛苦的神态。

label: [{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"局部皮肤增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"紫红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":35,"text":"紫红色积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"紫红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"局部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (三)剖检变化：局部皮肤增厚，肿胀，紫红色，皮下有数量不等的紫红色积液。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"胸腹部肌肉出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"溶血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"红色深重","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":47,"text":"灰黄色胶冻样的水肿液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"胸腹部肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"胸腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":30,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"翅内侧皮下","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 胸腹部肌肉出血、溶血，红色深重，如同红布一般。有的胸腹部或腿、翅内侧皮下有灰黄色胶冻样的水肿液。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"多发性关节炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"浆液性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":38,"text":"浆液性纤维素性渗出液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"化脓","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":52,"text":"干酪样坏死物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"关节囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"滑液囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"腱鞘","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 当发生多发性关节炎时，可见关节囊、滑液囊和腱鞘有浆液性或浆液性纤维素性渗出液，甚至可见化脓或干酪样坏死物。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"关节软骨处","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"干酪样物","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 有的关节软骨处出现糜烂和干酪样物。

label: [{"start":33,"end":40,"text":"革兰氏阳性球菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (四)细菌镜检：取病变明显处的组织涂片、染色、镜检，可见大小均等的革兰氏阳性球菌，无荚膜、无芽孢、无鞭毛，多数呈葡萄状堆积。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"保证全价营养","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"搞好环境卫生","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":36,"text":"过氧乙酸定期带鸡消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":37,"end":43,"text":"及时检修笼具","labels":["control"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"防止炸群","labels":["control"]},{"start":49,"end":58,"text":"作好鸡痘的免疫工作","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"过氧乙酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":34,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 加强饲养管理，保证全价营养，搞好环境卫生。用0.2%过氧乙酸定期带鸡消毒，及时检修笼具，防止炸群，作好鸡痘的免疫工作，这样可以大大减少发病机会。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"注意观察鸡群","labels":["control"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 注意观察鸡群，及早发现病鸡，早期治疗。

label: [{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"全群用药","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":26,"text":"口服抗生素类药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"抗生素类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"氟哌酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 发病初期有食欲时，应立即全群用药，可口服抗生素类药物，如氟哌酸等，使鸡体内达到有效药物浓度；

label: [{"start":1,"end":5,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":34,"text":"肌内注射抗生素类药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"抗生素类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"连续用药","labels":["control"]}]
text: 如食欲不振，口服不能达到有效药物浓度时，则可迅速肌内注射抗生素类药物，如庆大霉素、卡那霉素、链霉素等，首次用药采用突击量，并连续用药，避免产生抗药性。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"菌苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 鸡葡萄糖菌病已有菌苗应用于临床，有一定的保护作用，可根据本场情况试用。

label: [{"start":14,"end":21,"text":"金黄色葡萄球菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"葡萄球菌肠毒素","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":44,"text":"人类毒素性食物中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":54,"end":60,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 另外，需要提及的一个问题，即金黄色葡萄球菌能产生葡萄球菌肠毒素，是引起人类毒素性食物中毒的重要原因之一，故患鸡葡萄糖菌病肉尸严禁出场销售，禁止食用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":14,"text":"金黄色葡萄球菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"关节炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":39,"text":"皮肤发生水疱性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":39,"text":"水疱性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 葡萄球菌病是由金黄色葡萄球菌引起的传染病，主要特征是关节炎或皮肤发生水疱性炎症。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"肉用仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"笼养鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 主要发生于肉用仔鸡、笼养鸡及饲养条件较差的鸡，给养鸡业造成了较大损失。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"肉种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"轻型鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"中型鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"白羽","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"褐羽","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡葡萄糖菌病发生与鸡的品种有明显关系，肉种鸡及白羽产白壳蛋的轻型鸡易发、高发；而褐羽产褐壳蛋的中型鸡则很少发生。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肉用仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 肉用仔鸡对葡萄球菌病也较易感。另一特点是葡萄球菌病发生的时间是在鸡40～80日龄多发，成年鸡发生较少。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":25,"text":"皮肤黏膜损伤","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"损伤","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"皮肤黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":63,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 葡萄球菌病的发生多与创伤有关。凡能造成皮肤黏膜损伤的因素，如带翅号、断喙、刺种疫苗、网刺、刮伤和扭伤、啄伤等都可成为葡萄球菌病发生的诱因。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"脐带感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"脐带","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":23,"end":28,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 雏鸡脐带感染也较为常见。此外，当鸡痘发生时可致葡萄球菌病暴发。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"呼吸道感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 通过呼吸道感染也有可能。葡萄球菌病一年四季均可发生，以雨季、潮湿时节发生较多。饲养管理不善等能促进葡萄球菌病的发生。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"败血型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"呆立缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":26,"text":"羽毛粗乱无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"粗乱无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"两翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"食欲减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"绝食","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":18,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"两翅","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 败血型一般可见病鸡精神沉郁，呆立缩颈，羽毛粗乱无光泽.两翅下垂，食欲减少或绝食。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":19,"text":"排出灰白色或绿色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"灰白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":53,"text":"积聚数量不等的血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"胸腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":43,"text":"大腿内侧皮下浮肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"大腿内侧皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"浮肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 部分病鸡出现下痢.排出灰白色或绿色稀粪。较为特征的症状是胸腹部甚至波及大腿内侧皮下浮肿.积聚数量不等的血液和渗出液。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"紫黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"有波动感","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":26,"text":"局部羽毛用手一抹即可脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":57,"text":"腿翅部分关节肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"热痛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"行走不便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"跛行","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"喜卧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":79,"end":83,"text":"站立不稳","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":84,"end":90,"text":"倒地挣扎死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":55,"text":"腿翅部分关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"青年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":77,"end":79,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":97,"end":98,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"关节炎型","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 外观紫色或紫黑色，有波动感，局部羽毛用手一抹即可脱落。关节炎型多见于比较大的青年鸡和成年鸡，病鸡的腿翅部分关节肿胀、热痛、行走不便、跛行、喜卧。病程后期，病鸡站立不稳，倒地挣扎死亡。急性病例死亡鸡营养情况良好。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"胸部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"胸前","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"腹部皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"腹部皮下充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"溶血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":36,"text":"弥漫性紫红色或暗红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"暗红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"紫红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":45,"text":"伴有大量液体流出","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 剪开胸部皮肤，可见到整个胸前、腹部皮下充血、溶血，呈弥漫性紫红色或暗红色，伴有大量液体流出。

label: [{"start":11,"end":17,"text":"散在出血斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"胸骨突起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"突起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"两侧出血严重","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"肿大关节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":43,"text":"滑膜增厚充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"增厚充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":59,"text":"关节囊内有或多或少的浆液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"浆液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":69,"text":"纤维素性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"胸腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"大腿内侧肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"胸骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"滑膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"关节囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 胸腹部及大腿内侧肌肉有散在出血斑点，胸骨突起，两侧出血严重。剖开肿大关节，滑膜增厚充血、出血，关节囊内有或多或少的浆液，或有纤维素性渗出物。

label: [{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"干酪样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"关节囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病程稍长的鸡，在关节囊内可见到干酪样物。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肝肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"淡紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":17,"text":"大理石样花纹变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":32,"text":"数量不等的白色坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肝肿大呈淡紫色，有大理石样花纹变化，有的可见数量不等的白色坏死点。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"紫红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":19,"text":"心包膜内有淡红色液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"淡红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":28,"text":"心冠脂肪充血明显","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"充血明显","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"肠充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"心包膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"心冠脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":30,"text":"肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脾脏肿大呈紫红色。心包膜内有淡红色液体，心冠脂肪充血明显。肠充血、出血。

label: [{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 根据发病特点、临床症状、病理变化并结合细菌学检查进行葡萄球菌病的诊断。

label: [{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"水疱性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"关节肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"胸腹部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 诊断要点：多发生于3～6周龄的雏鸡，肉鸡发生较多。胸腹部皮肤发生水疱性炎症，关节肿大。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"采取药物治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"氟哌酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"新霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 采取药物治疗是防治葡萄球菌病的主要措施，庆大霉素、卡那霉素、痢特灵、氟哌酸、新霉素等均有一定的治疗效果。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"注意禽舍通风","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"保持清洁","labels":["control"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"避免拥挤","labels":["control"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"光照适当","labels":["control"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":45,"end":52,"text":"笼具要经常检修","labels":["control"]},{"start":66,"end":72,"text":"鸡痘免疫接种","labels":["control"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 加强饲养管理，注意禽舍通风，保持清洁，避免拥挤，光照适当，饲料中要有适当的维生素和无机盐，笼具要经常检修以防造成外伤，同时做好鸡群的鸡痘免疫接种工作。

label: [{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"过氧乙酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":25,"text":"定期对鸡舍进行带鸡消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 用0.1%~0.3%过氧乙酸定期对鸡舍进行带鸡消毒，对防治葡萄球菌病有较好效果。

label: [{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 在常发地区或药物治疗效果很差甚至无效的地区，可考虑使用疫苗接种防制葡萄球菌病。

label: [{"start":5,"end":19,"text":"鸡葡萄球菌多价氢氧化铝灭活苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"鸡葡萄糖菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 国内研制的鸡葡萄球菌多价氢氧化铝灭活苗可有效预防鸡葡萄糖菌病的发生。
